CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 14 reads: " The Winning Table - Pictured here is the winning table of the recent bridal contest at John Wesley AME Zion Church, where the Rev. H.W. McCreary III is pastor. The colors were pink and white.  left to right: Mmes. Hattie Bell, Myrtle Glover, Gladys Robinson, Vera Davis, Marie Rob, Lena Davis, Mr. Lee Davis, Mmes. Louise Junes, Edna Thompson and Hattie Childress.  Mrs. Lena Davis is chairman of the group."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Hattie Bell, Myrtle Glover, Gladys Robinson, Vera Davis, Marie Rob, Lena Davis, Lee Davis, Louise Junes, Edna Thompson, and Hattie Childress, posed at the winning table in bridal contest, Wesley Center AME Church
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Cakes--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Wesley Center African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Childress, Hattie.
